sourcing.instructions: Cobalt (II) Molybdate: Chemical supplier or online chemical marketplace
steps: Cobalt (II) Molybdate: Chemical supplier or online chemical marketplace
1. In a mixing container, combine 150 grams of Cobalt (II) Molybdate and 30 grams of Sodium carbonate.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a mixing container, combine 150 grams of Cobalt (II) Molybdate and 30 grams of Sodium carbonate.

steps: 1. Preheat the furnace or kiln to 800°C.
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat the furnace or kiln to 800°C.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down gradually to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down gradually to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).

steps: 1. Once cool, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cool, carefully remove the solid sample from the mold.
